pages.text: $(l)Concrete$() is an essential ingredient for the creation of the Launch pad and other machines necessary for space travel. However, crafting it is not easy.

Concrete is poured from $(l)Liquid concrete$(), which is made in a $(l)Mixer$(). Liquid concrete slowly hardens into $(l)Concrete blocks$(), but can also produce $(l)useless chunks$() if you are not careful. Liquid concrete is also useful for filling in infested caves to prevent parasites from spawning or even moving.

pages.title: Launch Pad
pages.text: Hardened concrete can be used to make $(l)Launch pads$(), nessecary for space travel...
...or it can be $(o)upgraded$() in the $(l)Blast Furnace$() to make $(l)Panzer$() and $(l)Uber$() concrete bricks, which are far tougher than regular bricks.
